articles.title: Tata Steel, JSW Steel, others clock gains as coking coal prices rise sharply - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Coking coal is a key raw material that is used in the manufacture of steel and any movement in its prices impacts the price of steel.
articles.content:
Shares of steel companies rose sharply in trade on February 21, following the rise in coking coal prices.
Tata Steel stock clocked intraday gains of around 3.7 percent, while JSW Steel was up 3.5 pe… [+1842 chars]
